content:
re write this paragraph to emphasize that we are working on the system's foundation. The most rewarding benefits will come when the details are implemented. 

"While we understand that the process of adapting the Teamwork platform takes time and patience, rest assured that we are working diligently to lay a solid foundation for the systems we are implementing. The eventual benefits will be worth the wait, and in the meantime, we are always available to address any questions or concerns you may have. Your cooperation and understanding are greatly appreciated."
